channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Fixed in next build of RPM (396-2 most likely).

Version:
openshift-origin-cartridge-fuse-6.1.0.redhat.399-1.el6op.noarch.rpm

[root@broker ~]# rhc snapshot-restore fuse11 -n fusedomain
Restoring from snapshot fuse11.tar.gz to application 'fuse11' ... done
